sentences.en: A happy ending is only possible because the hero has first vanquished the dragons.
sentences.cn: 只有主人公先把那些恶龙制服，快乐的结局才有可能。

sentences.en: At first she shivered from her fear but at last she could vanquish it.
sentences.cn: 起初她因害怕而颤抖,但最后终于能克服它.

sentences.en: Gao Taigong asks Wang Tianshi a Sorcerer to vanquish this demon.
He tried to vanquish his fears.
HELPERKALECENCOURAGE. wav - > Strike now Heroes! While he's weaken! Vanquish the Deceiver!
sentences.cn: 进击, 英雄们! 他的气力已被减弱了! 打败欺诈者.

sentences.en: HELPERKALECGOSINTRO . wav - & gt ; You are not alone, the blue dragonflight shall help you vanquish the Deceiver.
sentences.cn: 卡: 你们不是孤军奋战, 蓝军军团会帮助你们击败欺诈者.
他的成功压抑了他害怕的心理.

sentences.en: It alone has the gods'foretold power to vanquish any enemy.
sentences.cn: 神'预言他的力量战胜任何敌人.

sentences.en: It is no honour for an eagle to vanquish a dove.
Kalecgos yells : You are not alone! The blue dragon flight shall help you vanquish the Deceiver!
sentences.cn: 卡雷苟斯: 你们并不是孤独的! 蓝龙军团将帮忙你们击败欺诈者!

sentences.en: Since then, antibiotics and vaccines have allowed us to vanquish entire classes of diseases.
sentences.cn: 此后, 抗生素与疫苗的出现,使我们征服了各种疾病.

sentences.en: So, soon it may become possible to vanquish Alzheimer's with a vaccine that targets these miscreants.
sentences.cn: 所以不久之后,我们就有可能通过注射对付变体蛋白这些恶棍的疫苗,来降服早老性痴呆玻.

sentences.en: Strike now Heroes! While he's weaken! Vanquish the Deceiver!
sentences.cn: 进攻,英雄们! 他的力量已经被削弱了! 打败欺诈者!

sentences.en: The LORD can give the enemy long odds and yet vanquish him.
sentences.cn: 上帝可以让仇敌暂时兴旺一阵,但终必消灭他.

sentences.en: Yes, courage alone cannot vanquish all evils.
sentences.cn: 是的, 单是勇气不可能战胜这一切危险.
你必须克服你的恐惧心理.

trans.tran_cn: 征服, 击败, 克服
trans.tran_en: to defeat someone or something completely
